Accelerate Development. Automate Deployment. Scale Seamlessly.

DevOps as a Service

At Plattr Tech Studio, we offer DevOps as a Service to help businesses streamline software delivery, reduce time-to-market, and achieve continuous deployment with confidence. Whether you're a startup scaling fast or an enterprise modernizing legacy workflows, our DevOps solutions bring agility, automation, and reliability to every stage of your development lifecycle.

Book a Call

What is DevOps as a
Service?

DevOps as a Service is a fully managed approach to integrating development and operations using automation, collaboration tools, cloud platforms, and best practices. Our team handles everything from infrastructure setup and pipeline automation to monitoring and scaling — so your developers can focus on building great products.

Our DevOps Capabilities

Infrastructure as Code (IaC)

We use Terraform, Ansible, or Pulumi to define and manage your infrastructure in code — making your cloud infrastructure reproducible, scalable, and auditable.

CI/CD Pipeline Implementation

We design and manage fully automated Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines that ensure fast, frequent, and reliable code delivery. Get your features to production faster — with fewer bugs and rollbacks.

Containerization & Kubernetes

Using Docker and Kubernetes, we containerize your applications for better portability, scalability, and resource efficiency. We set up orchestrators, service meshes, and Helm charts to make your system production-ready.

Security & Compliance Automation

Shift security left with DevSecOps practices. We integrate automated security checks, vulnerability scanning, and compliance workflows into your CI/CD pipelines.

Monitoring & Logging

We set up proactive monitoring, alerting, and logging systems using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, and Datadog. You’ll have full visibility into system health, app performance, and potential risks.

Cloud-Native DevOps

We specialize in DevOps for AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure. From scalable infrastructure to cloud-native deployments, we ensure your cloud environment is optimized for security, performance, and automation.

Why Choose Devops from Plattr Tech Studio?

Faster releases through automated deployments

Robust testing and rollback strategies

Expertise in cloud-native and hybrid infrastructure

Seamless integration with your existing tools and platforms

Dedicated support and continuous optimization
